subject: Greetings, how are you today?
body:
Greetings, how are you today?
  We are the (world justice)and we are also here to help you to claim your funds cause we observe you are going through a lot on getting your funds, just email us if you need to claim your funds or else we are going to put your funds in the USA treasure account as an abandon property..
  So if you still need your funds email us so we can get everything done for you..
 Best Regards,
 Miss Victoria V. Joy.

subject: Re: Greetings, how are you today?
body:
Hello Miss Victoria V. Joy,

I hope you're doing well. I'm quite intrigued by your message about these funds. Could you please provide more details about this? How did my name come up in relation to these funds? And what exactly does the process of claiming them involve?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Laura

subject: Re: Greetings, how are you today?
body:
Your name was there just because it meant to be there and you are the
chosen one that is why we are here telling you to get your funds with no
stress.
 All you just need to do is to send us your address and we will come over
to get your funds to you,then it requires some fee..Your are going to pay
the sum of $350 for the document to be signed cause it has to be signed
before your funds can get to you.We know you are the lucky one next,
CONGRATULATIONS TO YOU!!!
  Immediately this email gets to you please let us know,we will wait for
your wonderful response.

subject: Re: Greetings, how are you today?
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite an unexpected message! It's not every day that one gets told they're the chosen one. Could you please elaborate more on what these funds are about? And why was I specifically chosen?

Also, could you clarify what document needs to be signed and why it requires payment? I'm just trying to understand the whole process better.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Laura

subject: Re: Greetings, how are you today?
body:
Please I want to know something do you need your funds or not and if know I
will stop disturbing because I know is hard for you to believe me, am I
will if am the one but you just need to trust me this once is see if you
will not get your funds...

subject: Re: Greetings, how are you today?
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your concern about the funds. However, could you please provide more details? Like, what are these funds for? And how did I come to be involved in this? 

I'm just trying to understand the situation better. Thanks again!

Best wishes,
Laura

subject: Re: Greetings, how are you today?
body:
The funds is your inheritance and the only thing holding is the approval
document which will cost you $200 and you will receive your funds that same
day..

subject: Re: Greetings, how are you today?
body:

Thank you for your message. I'm really excited about the prospect of receiving these funds! Could you please provide me with more details? For instance, what is this approval document and why is it necessary? Also, how much will it cost me to get this document?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Laura

subject: Re: Greetings, how are you today?
body:
These certificate confirms all the rights and obligations such as award of
contract, execution of contract, inheritance and claim of credit under the
Unite Nation security service act of transfer/receive of money.

And the amount you are sending is $250 only and you will receive your funds
that same day...

subject: Re: Greetings, how are you today?
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It sounds quite interesting! Could you please elaborate more on the United Nation security service act of transfer receive of money? I'm not very familiar with it. Also, could you clarify what you mean by "the amount you are sending is only"? I'm a bit confused about that part.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Laura

subject: Re: Greetings, how are you today?
body:
Like the amount in the document you are to pay for before receiving
your fund, and please when are you sending the needed fee to continue?

subject: Re: Greetings, how are you today?
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It sounds quite interesting! I'm not very familiar with the United Nations security service act of transfer receive of money. Could you please explain it a bit more? 

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "the amount you are sending is only"? I'm not sure I understand that part. And how exactly does one receive their funds on the same day?

Looking forward to your response!

Best wishes,
Laura
